metadata.title: Security forces kill 30 Indian-sponsored Khawarij terrorists in Orakzai district

content.article_body: RAWALPINDI, Oct 10 (APP):Security forces killed all 30 Indian-sponsored Khawarij terrorists after an intense exchange of fire during an operation in the general area of Jamal Maya, Orakzai district. "During the conduct of operation, based on credible intelligence, in the general area Jamal Maya, Orakzai District, after intense fire exchanges, all thirty Indian sponsored khawarij involved in the terrorist incident have been sent to hell," said a news release issued by Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR). Security Forces have been conducting a series of retribution operations against the Kharji involved in the heinous incident that occurred in Orakzai District on 7 October, resulting in the Shahadat of brave sons of soil, including Lieutenant Colonel Junaid Tariq and Major Tayyab Rahat, it further said. These successful operations have avenged the heinous act and have brought the main perpetrators to justice. "Sanitization operations are being conducted to hunt and eliminate any other Indian sponsored Kharji found in the area, as the security forces of Pakistan are determined and remain steadfast to eradicate and wipe out the menace of Indian sponsored terrorism from the country," the news release said.
